JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description   We are looking for a talented Software Engineers (iOS Android) to join our agile development team. You will help in the development of Eagleview s mobile applications,  leveraging our micro- services platform across multiple industries and form- factors. In this role,  you must be able to multi- task,  quickly adapt to new development environments,  learn new systems,  create reliable/maintainable code,  and find creative and scalable solutions to difficult and complex problems. You take pride and ownership in your work as well as the overall contributions of the team.
